DOC.detailed_description: Madhya Pradesh 's program provision care child severe acute malnutrition ( SAM ) initiate district Shivpuri January 2006 . By January 1 , 2010 , Madhya Pradesh National Rural Health Mission ( NRHM ) establish 199 Nutrition Rehabilitation Centers ( NRCs ) child receive therapeutic care follow protocol base guideline management SAM World Health Organization ( WHO ) Indian Academy Pediatrics . The detection child SAM ensure community frontline worker context monthly growth monitor promotion session . Once NRC age , weight , height , mid-upper arm circumference ( MUAC ) presence bilateral pit edema determine child . SAM define per WHO recommendations presence bilateral pit edema presence severe wasting . Severe waste define MUAC 115 mm and/or weight-for-height z-score ( WHZ ) < - 3 median WHZ WHO Child Growth Standards . All child 6-59 month bilateral pit edema , and/or WHZ < - 3 and/or MUAC < 115 mm admit NRC . Once child admit NRC , medical doctor conduct clinical examination detect presence medical complication ( lethargy , pneumonia , dehydration , fever , tuberculosis , and/or severe anemia ) use criterion Integrated Management Neonatal Childhood Illnesses ( IMNCI ) . As per protocol , child edema , and/or medical complication , and/or poor appetite feed locally-prepared F-75 therapeutic milk every two hour 48 hour ( stabilization phase ) medical complication treat . After completion initial 48 hour , child feed alternatively F-75 locally-prepared F-100 therapeutic milk six time day 48 hour ( transition phase ) . After transition phase , child feed F-100 locally-produced lipid-based therapeutic food ( TF ) aim initiate rapid weight gain ( rehabilitation phase ) . Children normal appetite free medical complication enter rehabilitation phase day admission . All child receive course broad spectrum antibiotic . Upon completion prescribe 14-day stay NRC , child transition community phase program follow community-based frontline worker . Frontline worker ensure child benefit Supplementary Nutrition Program ( SNP ) return follow visit NRC every 15 day 60 day follow discharge . At four follow visit , child 's weight gain assess mother counsel child feed care . From January 1 December 31 , 2010 total 44,017 child 6-59 month old admitted IM-SAM program . This study evaluate effectiveness program analyze program outcome sample child ( n=2,740 ) randomly select among 44,017 child admit .
